experiments.name: contact_memory_en

game_instances.prompt:

Last Name: Gutierrez

Work: Saudi Aramco
Hobby: Role-playing games
game_instances.question: What is the last name of the person works for Saudi Aramco?

experiments.initial_prompt: Your task is to remember person contact information including first name, last name, work, email, as well as hobbies and physical attributes. Important: You have to remember contact information for many people.
